title: The Robin
creator_credit: Donald Eastman, Rosemary Eastman and Gateway Educational Films
brief_description: A study of the robin and its relationship with man. Courtship behaviour, nest building and the rearing of young are shown in detail and the differences between migratory and non-migratory birds is explained.
creator_credit_for_label: Donald Eastman, Rosemary Eastman and Gateway Educational Films
